featured.text: Early this past summer the three whales were pronounced fit enough to be returned to the Atlantic Ocean.
He wanted to record how they pronounced numbers.

definition.zh_def: 發音；用聲音表達語言或詞語的方式。
definition.en_def: To articulate or produce the sounds of speech; to say a word or phrase aloud.
definition.example: Can you pronounce this word for me?
